bike.description: S-Works FACT 11r carbon, FACT IS construction, aero tube shape, compact race design, tapered 1-1/8" to 1-3/8" head tube, internal cable routing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings, w/ custom integrated top cap
S-Works ProSet Stem, 7050 3D forged with carbon-wrap top cap and front cap, ti front bolts, alloy top bolt , alloy shim
Press-in OSBB cups w/ ceramic bearings
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
S-Works Turbo w/ BlackBelt protection, 220 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
S-Works Turbo w/ BlackBelt protection, 220 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Body Geometry Romin Evo Expert w/ hollow ti rails
S-Works Venge FACT carbon, flippable 20/0mm offset
